title: Standard Hardware

## Overview

In this project, we purchase some standard hardware components to assemble the QuACK system. We will provide links to the components we used, along with brief descriptions of their purpose.

## Order Check List
- [ ] (1) [19'' Rack Box Enclosure](https://www.newark.com/bud-industries/nhc-14156/cabinet-rack-mount-4-5in-aluminum/dp/06M4739?CMP=AFC-ECIA)
- [ ] (32) [CN-0531 DAC Boards](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/analog-devices-inc/EVAL-CN0531-PMDZ/13986379)
- [ ] (4) [Pin Jumper (2-pos, 0.100" pitch)](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/24348/1532917)
- [ ] (27) [PCB Standoffs](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/24348/1532917)
- [ ] (19) [Steel M3 Nuts](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/4708/4499301)
- [ ] (7) [Short Screw](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/29311/1532208)
- [ ] (12) [Long Screw](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/29316/1532210?s=N4IgTCBcDa4JwGYCMA2EBdAvkA)
- [ ] (12) [5.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/essentra-components/MNI-4-10/241638)
- [ ] (12) [3.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/essentra-components/MNI-4-5/241635?s=N4IgTCBcDaILIDkCSBaALCgrCAugXyA)
- [ ] (32) [JST PH 2-Pin Female 4" cable](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/adafruit-industries-llc/261/5353586)

- [ ] (8) [Ribbon Cable Connector (2x12 Female)](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/te-connectivity-amp-connectors/1658622-5/825415)
- [ ] [Ribbon Cable (1.27mm, 28AWG, 24cond)](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/3m/3365-24-300SF/21630383)

## Order Details
- **19'' Rack Box Enclosure**:
    - **Purpose**: This enclosure serves as the main housing for the QuACK system, providing protection and organization for the internal components.
    - **Link**: [3U Rack Box Enclosure](https://www.newark.com/bud-industries/nhc-14156/cabinet-rack-mount-4-5in-aluminum/dp/06M4739?CMP=AFC-ECIA)
    - **Datasheet**: [Rack Box Enclosure Datasheet](https://www.farnell.com/datasheets/1808028.pdf)
    ![Rack Box Enclosure Picture](images/Rack_Box_Enclosure.png)

- **CN-0531 DAC Boards**:
    - **Purpose**: These boards are used for digital-to-analog conversion, allowing the QuACK system to output analog signals.
    - **Link**: [DAC board](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/analog-devices-inc/EVAL-CN0531-PMDZ/13986379) 
    - **Datasheet**: [CN-0531 DAC Board Datasheet](https://www.analog.com/media/en/reference-design-documentation/reference-designs/cn0531.pdf)
    ![DAC Board](images/dac_board.jpg)

- **Pin Jumper (2-pos, 0.100" pitch)**: 
    - **Purpose**: These jumpers are used to connect the DAC boards to the QuACK system, allowing for communication and control.
    - **Link**: [Pin Jumper](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/sullins-connector-solutions/STC02SYAN/76372)
    - **Datasheet**: [Pin Jumper Datasheet](https://drawings-pdf.s3.amazonaws.com/11134.pdf)
    ![Pin Jumper](images/pin_jumper.jpg)
- **PCB Standoffs**:
    - **Purpose**: These standoffs are used to secure the input board into a stacked configuration within the QuACK system, providing mechanical stability and separation between components.
    - **Link**: [PCB Standoffs](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/24348/1532917)
    - **Datasheet**: [PCB Standoff Datasheet](https://www.keyelco.com/userAssets/file/M65p76.pdf)
    ![PCB Standoffs](images/pcb_standoffs.jpg)
- **Steel M3 Nuts**:    
    - **Purpose**: These nuts are used in conjunction with the PCB standoffs to secure the input/output/coupling board and other components within the QuACK system.
    - **Link**: [Steel M3 Nuts](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/4708/4499301)
    - **Datasheet**: [Steel M3 Nuts Datasheet](https://www.keyelco.com/userAssets/file/M65p135.pdf) 
    ![Steel M3 Nuts](images/nuts_m3.jpg)
- **Short Screw**:
    - **Purpose**: These screws are used to secure various components within the QuACK system, including the input and output boards.
    - **Link**: [Short Screw](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/29311/1532208)
    - **Datasheet**: [Short Screw Datasheet](https://www.keyelco.com/userAssets/file/M65p135.pdf)
    ![Short Screw](images/short_screw.jpg)
- **Long Screw**:
    - **Purpose**: These screws are used to secure the input and output boards within the QuACK system, providing stability and mechanical support.
    - **Link**: [Long Screw](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/keystone-electronics/29316/1532210?s=N4IgTCBcDa4JwGYCMA2EBdAvkA)
    - **Datasheet**: [Long Screw Datasheet](https://www.keyelco.com/userAssets/file/M65p121.pdf)
    ![Long Screw](images/long_screw.jpeg)
- **5.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer**:
    - **Purpose**: These spacers are used to create a gap between the input/output boards.
    - **Link**: [5.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/essentra-components/MNI-4-10/241638)
    - **Datasheet**: [5.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer Datasheet](https://media.digikey.com/pdf/Data%20Sheets/Richco%20Inc%20PDFs/MNI%20Series.pdf)
    ![5.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](images/5.3mm_spacer.jpeg)
- **3.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer**:        
    - **Purpose**: These spacers are used to create a gap between the input/output boards.
    - **Link**: [3.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/essentra-components/MNI-4-5/241635?s=N4IgTCBcDaILIDkCSBaALCgrCAugXyA)
    - **Datasheet**: [3.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer Datasheet](https://media.digikey.com/pdf/Data%20Sheets/Richco%20Inc%20PDFs/MNI%20Series.pdf)
    ![3.3mm Nylon M3 Spacer](images/3.3mm_spacer.jpeg)
- **JST PH 2-Pin Female 4'' cable**:
    - **Purpose**: These cables are used to connect the DAC boards to the QuACK system, allowing for communication and control.
    - **Link**: [JST PH 2-Pin Female 4" cable](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/adafruit-industries-llc/261/5353586)      
    - **Datasheet**: [JST PH 2-Pin Female 4" cable Datasheet](https://mm.digikey.com/Volume0/opasdata/d220001/medias/docus/811/261_Web.pdf)
    ![JST PH Cable](images/jst_ph_cable.jpg)
- **Microfit Power Cable**:
    - **Purpose**: This cable is used to provide power to the QuACK system
    - **Link**: [Microfit Power Cable](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/molex/2147502022/12373741)
    - **Datasheet**: [Microfit Power Cable Datasheet](https://www.molex.com/en-us/products/part-detail/2147502022?display=pdf)
    ![Microfit Power Cable](images/microfit_power_cable.jpg)
- **Ribbon Cable Connector**
    - **Purpose**: These connectors are used to connect the ribbon cable to the QuACK system, allowing for communication and control between components.
    - **Link**: [Ribbon Cable Connector (2x12 female)](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/te-connectivity-amp-connectors/1658622-5/825415)
    - **Datasheet**: [Ribbon Cable Connector Datasheet](https://www.te.com/commerce/DocumentDelivery/DDEController?Action=srchrtrv&DocNm=114-40005&DocType=SS&DocLang=EN)
    ![Ribon Cable Connectors](images/ribbon_cable_connector.jpg)
- **Ribbon Cable (1.27mm, 28AWG, 24cond)**:
    - **Purpose**: This ribbon cable is used to connect the QuACK system to various components, allowing for communication and control.
    - **Link**: [Ribbon Cable (1.27mm, 28AWG, 24cond)](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/3m/3365-24-300SF/21630383)
    - **Datasheet**: [Ribbon Cable Datasheet](https://mm.digikey.com/Volume0/opasdata/d220001/medias/docus/5587/13751-ESD_TS-0080.indd.pdf)
    ![Ribbon Cable](images/ribbon_cable.jpg)
- **Male to male 25pin DSUB cable**:
    - **Purpose**: This cable is used to connect the QuACK system to the FPGA through the coupling board, allowing for communication and control.
    - **Link**: [Female to Female 25pin DSUB cable](https://www.l-com.com/d-sub-economy-molded-d-sub-cable-db25-male-male-50-ft)
    ![Male to Male DSUB](images/dsub_cable.jpg)
